traits.Battle Readiness: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.
traits.Improved Critical: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.
traits.Martial Role: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:

actions.Extra Attack: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
